alert.note: Alert for Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 3:08AM MST until February 22 at 4:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Colorado, Grand Valley and Debeque to Silt Corridor. In Utah, Arches/Grand Flat. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand Valley
